formattedAddress: 6 E 45th St Fl. 20, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 6 E 45th St Fl. 20, New York, NY 10017, USA

editorialSummary.text: Sapphires, rubies & engagement rings in a penthouse-floor jewelry showroom open by appointment.

originalText.text: So happy and satisfied I found you guys! I was researching sapphires one day and your site came up. I was blown away by the setup on your web page. Very in depth and informative. The layout and attention to detail proved that I was in the right place. After a few weeks, I finally decided to make a purchase. I was a little nervous at first because this was all online and it's a big purchase. But I read the  reviews and had confidence that I was making a good bet. Well, the bet paid off! I loved the process of it all. Follow up email to make sure it was actually YOU making the purchase. Then, 2 day shipping with signature needed. Then, follow up email to make sure you actually received your product. My gem came exactly as pictured, and packaging was gorgeous. Thank you guys so much! I'll be back again!

originalText.text: I recommend The Natural Sapphire Company with all my heart. I have been looking for a white sapphire all over Romania to make an engagement ring for my lover. Not finding anything, I turned to the internet and found The Natural Sapphire Company which blew me away with the professionalism and customer support. When making the purchase, you have all the information of the stones that you could possibly ask for. After the purchase, Lauren checked in with me several times and even if my package arrived a bit late because of the postal services, I never had the feeling that the order will not get to me. Excellent service and excellent product, keep doing what you do because it's perfect!

originalText.text: I love working with the Natural Sapphire Company, and they have become my go to place when I want to source high quality sapphires! I always work with Lauren, who is always simply outstanding when it comes to customer service, and the entire process from start to finish is flawless and smooth! I wanted a unheated yellow sapphire and was able to source this beauty for a very reasonable price! I had it made into a ring, and can't express enough how much the sapphire sparkles! Highly recommend going here if you want to find a unique and one of a kind gem!

originalText.text: I can't say enough good things about Katherine and the Natural Sapphire Company. I had been shopping online for the perfect sapphire engagement ring for months. I found the setting I really loved on one website and the stone on another (The Natural Sapphire Co). After sending over a screenshot of the setting I wanted, Katherine was able to have an artist rendering put together of that setting with their stone for my approval. Even though the setting wasn't in their inventory, they were able to duplicate exactly what I wanted and craft the perfect ring for me. The end product was beautiful in pictures but absolutely stunning in person. Oh and the box! Wow, the box the ring came in was just as impressive as the ring itself.   I will recommend The Natural Sapphire Company to anyone and everyone. They definitely know quality and customer satisfaction.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of purchasing from the Natural Sapphire Company, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of spectacular. From the moment I began my search for the perfect gemstone, the service I received was impeccable, with a special shout-out to Lauren for her outstanding assistance.

Lauren went above and beyond to ensure that every question was answered and every concern addressed, making the process seamless and enjoyable. Her expertise and passion for sapphires were evident, providing valuable insights that greatly assisted in making the perfect choice. Her dedication to customer satisfaction truly sets a high standard.

The quality of the sapphire I received is remarkable, boasting a brilliance and clarity that exceeded my expectations. The craftsmanship of the setting and the attention to detail in every aspect of the product reaffirmed my decision to choose the Natural Sapphire Company.

What impressed me most, aside from the stunning sapphire, was the level of personalized service and care provided throughout the process. It’s rare to find a company that combines such high-quality products with genuinely heartfelt customer service.

I wholeheartedly recommend the Natural Sapphire Company to anyone looking for exquisite sapphires complemented by exceptional service. Whether you know exactly what you’re looking for or need guidance through the selection process, Lauren and the team will ensure your experience is as brilliant as their gemstones.

Thank you, Natural Sapphire Company, and a massive thank you to Lauren for making everything about this purchase amazing. I look forward to cherishing my sapphire for years to come and will definitely be returning for future purchases.
